cause.description:
MasterOf Disaster is a smart, sexy, and young guys that needs to be steered down the right path!!! He needs support and YOU can help, we have to make sure those bad influences in his life don't get to him!!!!
1. MasterOf Disaster has to become successful in his life.
2. Master0f Disaster is the future
cause.mission: Make sure his life goes down the right path
cause.name: Save MasterOf Disaster from DISASTER!!!!
